_header: Witten all that is and is gone
Subjects: charters; Ripon, abbey of; Aethelstan, king
_description: A rhymed charter purporting to be from King Athelston to the Abbey of Ripon — fourteen couplets

BodDod160.Editions:
Fowler,  Joseph Thomas,
                        ed.  
             Memorials of the Church of SS. Peter and Wilfrid, Ripon.
             4 vols. 
             Surtees Society
         74 (1882), 78 (1886), 81 (1888), 115 (1908): 1.90-3.

CamTCC1174.First Lines:
Witen all þat is and is ganeÞat ich King
                    Adelstane…
CamTCC1174.Last Lines:
…And my seile have ich set þartoFor I will þat Na
                    man this gift undo
